casename: Lim Ek Kian v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Tan Bar Tien and Winston Quek Seng Soon (B T Tan & Company) for the appellant; Sia Aik Kor (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Offences/Property/Forgery for the purposes of cheating/Whether all the elements were made out/Whether the requisite mens rea was present/Penal Code (Cap 224) s 468 read with s 415, s 24.
Evidence/Witnesses/Impeaching witnesses’ credibility/Whether evidence of past lies affect credibility/Whether questions to find such examples of past lies desirable.
